org.objenesis.instantiator.util

类 ClassDefinitionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objenesis.instantiator.util.ClassDefinitionUtils

  • public final class ClassDefinitionUtils
extends Object
    Helper class for ProxyObjectInstantiator. We can see the details of a class specification here

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static String classNameToInternalClassName(String className)
      Will convert a class name to its name in the class definition format (e.g org.objenesis.EmptyClass becomes org/objenesis/EmptyClass)
      static String classNameToResource(String className)
      Will convert a class name to its class loader resource name (e.g org.objenesis.EmptyClass becomes org/objenesis/EmptyClass.class)
      static <T> Class<T> defineClass(String className, byte[] b, ClassLoader loader)
      Define a class in the provided class loader from the array of bytes.
      static <T> Class<T> getExistingClass(ClassLoader classLoader, String className)
      Check if this class already exists in the class loader and return it if it does
      static byte[] readClass(String className)
      Read the bytes of a class from the classpath
      static void writeClass(String fileName, byte[] bytes)
      Write all class bytes to a file.

    • 方法详细资料

      • defineClass

        public static <T> Class<T> defineClass(String className,
                                       byte[] b,
                                       ClassLoader loader)
                                throws Exception
        Define a class in the provided class loader from the array of bytes. Inspired by cglib ReflectUtils.defineClass
        类型参数:
        T - type of the class returned
        参数:
        className - class name in the format org.objenesis.MyClass
        b - bytes representing the class
        loader - the class loader where the class will be loaded
        返回:
        the newly loaded class
        抛出:
        Exception - whenever something goes wrong

      • readClass

        public static byte[] readClass(String className)
                        throws IOException
        Read the bytes of a class from the classpath
        参数:
        className - full class name including the package
        返回:
        the bytes representing the class
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class is longer than 2500 bytes
        IOException - if we fail to read the class

      • writeClass

        public static void writeClass(String fileName,
                              byte[] bytes)
                       throws IOException
        Write all class bytes to a file.
        参数:
        fileName - file where the bytes will be written
        bytes - bytes representing the class
        抛出:
        IOException - if we fail to write the class

      • classNameToInternalClassName

        public static String classNameToInternalClassName(String className)
        Will convert a class name to its name in the class definition format (e.g org.objenesis.EmptyClass becomes org/objenesis/EmptyClass)
        参数:
        className - full class name including the package
        返回:
        the internal name

      • classNameToResource

        public static String classNameToResource(String className)
        Will convert a class name to its class loader resource name (e.g org.objenesis.EmptyClass becomes org/objenesis/EmptyClass.class)
        参数:
        className - full class name including the package
        返回:
        the resource name

      • getExistingClass

        public static <T> Class<T> getExistingClass(ClassLoader classLoader,
                                            String className)
        Check if this class already exists in the class loader and return it if it does
        类型参数:
        T - type of the class returned
        参数:
        classLoader - Class loader where to search the class
        className - Class name with full path
        返回:
        the class if it already exists or null
